segments.text: I notice the calm garden outside the window, and it makes me happy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The path and the bushes look so tidy and peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the woman drying the plate, completely unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so quiet while they try to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is being very brave, standing on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl looks so cute with her hand outstretched, waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they will share the cookies with their mom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen seems so cozy, despite the little chaos happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water spilling over, but it doesn't seem to bother anyone.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the children are having a little adventure, trying to get cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they enjoy their little treat.
segments.speaker: PAR
